channel.title: [317]Destinypking[317]
channel.description:
[size=36pt]DestinyPking [317][/size]
Hello, ive wanted to make a 317 server called destinypking. i started at it but it has a long time to go, so i need a developement team to code of/host/test.
My idea is to make it a server with 2 worlds ( different heigth levels ) A Normal world For training/skilling/making money/trading and stuff just like runescape. and a Pking world with outside of edgeville bank pking :) i started on a new Edgeville bank for pking World
I mean just like clicking in quest tab Like this:
World 1 (Normal) World 2 (Pking)
The base is delta for now but maybe i will go to another base if you people want :)
Intressting?
Pm/Post on this topic
[b]Name: Age: Position: Experience: MSN:[/b]
[size=12pt]OPEN SPOTS:[/size] [b] Server Coder: Nick Server Coder 2: Me Client Coder: [OPEN] Client Coder 2: [OPEN] Hoster: [OPEN] Website/Forum Designer: [OPEN] Beta Tester: [OPEN] Beta Tester 2: [OPEN][/b]
Hope you people are intresting :$
[b][size=14pt]FEEL FREE TO ADD ME ON MSN Destinypking@hotmail.com[/size][/b]

item.title: [317]Destinypking[317]
item.dc:creator: @lhr lhr
item.description:
@lhr wrote:

never tried a server with 2 worlds so i thought ill join.
Name:Dynamic(lhr)

Experience:made a few sites for many people made themes

item.title: [317]Destinypking[317]
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

i aprove , this works
the bad thing is that you wil see that objects are spawned on both worlds , as well as people on the normal world will see the drops on the PVP world ( and vice-versa ).
so you might to change the locations completely…

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Destinypking[317]
item.dc:creator: @drachtpkz123 drachtpkz123
item.description:
@drachtpkz123 wrote:

[quote=“iDontRun, post:3, topic:334312”]Hmm… sounds alot like a 508.
I’ve never actually seen this done in a 317 or a delta for that matter.
So i guess ill give it a go…

name: Nick
Age: 15
Position Applying for: Server Coder.
Experience: I’ve coded many servers before (mostly 317’s not a whole lot of 377’s) i’ve coded for Rune-Pkz,SmogScape, etc goes on, I’m very advanced when it comes to JDK/JRE… and i’ve coded for around 3-4 years.
MSN: Purplelama2@Hotmail.com, feel free to pm me on it.[/quote]

Ive added you

[quote=“mpsmpsmps, post:2, topic:334312”]dude, you could do that, but it blows even more, just make a client sided edit and host 2 servers on one computer, one on port 43594, other one on 5555 or sumthing, you can add that into the client + save your character files at C:/ and make sure both servers will load from the C:/ so they got both same accounts.

Good Luck.

Dutch God[/quote]

Good idea want to help??

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Destinypking[317]
item.dc:creator: @mpsmpsmps mpsmpsmps
item.description:
@mpsmpsmps wrote:

dude, you could do that, but it blows even more, just make a client sided edit and host 2 servers on one computer, one on port 43594, other one on 5555 or sumthing, you can add that into the client + save your character files at C:/ and make sure both servers will load from the C:/ so they got both same accounts.

Good Luck.

Dutch God

Read full topic
